com.gotenna.sdk.user

Class UserDataStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gotenna.sdk.user.UserDataStore

  • public class UserDataStore
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton that keeps track of the current user identified with the goTenna. Created on 2/12/15.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGroupGID(long groupGID)
      Adds the group GID to the list of the current user's valid group GIDs.
      void deleteCurrentUser()
      Deletes the current user identifier as the goTenna's user.

      Removes the group GID from the current user's list of valid GIDs.

      Retrieves the current user, identifies which user this goTenna currently belongs to.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static UserDataStore getInstance()
        The shared singleton instance.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance.

      • setCurrentUser

        public void setCurrentUser(User currentUser)
        Sets the current user, identifies which user this goTenna currently belongs to.
        Parameters:
        currentUser - The current user.

      • getCurrentUser

        public User getCurrentUser()
        Retrieves the current user, identifies which user this goTenna currently belongs to.
        Returns:
        The current user.

      • updateLastConnectedTime

        public void updateLastConnectedTime()
        Automatically called upon goTenna connection and disconnection. Updates the last time the user was considered connected to the goTenna. Cached and saved with the rest of the user's basic info.

      • updateLastLocation

        public void updateLastLocation(double latitude,
                      double longitude,
                      float accuracy,
                      long timestamp)
        Updates the user's last recorded location. This location is cached with the user's basic info.
        Parameters:
        latitude - The user's last recorded latitude.
        longitude - The user's last recorded longitude.
        accuracy - The horizontal accuracy of the recorded location.
        timestamp - The time the location was recorded.

      • saveCurrentUser

        public void saveCurrentUser()
        Caches the current user's info to SharedPreferences

      • deleteCurrentUser

        public void deleteCurrentUser()
        Deletes the current user identifier as the goTenna's user.

      • hasValidUser

        public boolean hasValidUser()
        Indicates if a valid user exists or not.
        Returns:
        True if a valid user exists, false otherwise.

      • isMyGID

        public boolean isMyGID(long gId)
        Indicates if the current user's GID matches the passed in GID.
        Parameters:
        gId - The goTenna ID to compare against.
        Returns:
        True if the GID matches, false otherwise.

      • addGroupGID

        public void addGroupGID(long groupGID)
        Adds the group GID to the list of the current user's valid group GIDs. This method is called automatically via GTCommandCenter.createGroupWithGIDs(List, GTCommandCenter.GTGroupInviteResponseListener, GTCommandCenter.GTGroupInviteErrorListener) It is also automatically called when an incoming GTGroupCreationMessageData is detected.
        Parameters:
        groupGID - The group GID to add.

      • hasGroupGID

        public boolean hasGroupGID(long groupGID)
        Checks to see if this group GID is already listed as one of the current user's valid group GIDs.
        Parameters:
        groupGID - The group GID to check.
        Returns:
        True if this group GID already exists in the current user's cached info, false otherwise.

      • deleteGroupGID

        public void deleteGroupGID(long groupGID)
        Removes the group GID from the current user's list of valid GIDs.
        Parameters:
        groupGID - The group GID to delete.

      • registerUser

        public User registerUser(java.lang.String name,
                long gid)
        Overrides the current user's info with this new info. Creates a new user if one does not exist already.
        Parameters:
        name - The user's name.
        gid - The user's personal GID (goTenna ID)
        Returns:
        The user with the updated info.
